name: quizproject
description: aiming to make it abstracted - the code needs to take the radios in as an array  - use a for loop based on array length to cycle through the radio inputs - the checked radio's value (e.g. a's = 1, b's = 2, c's = 3) is stored  - the total of all answer's values is then subject to if/else conditions - these conditions will test if there are mostly A/B/C and so on.
